about_the_game:
Exo Mayhem is a supervillain action game where you can soar freely through the skies of a lush multi-biome mall and unleash mayhem and destruction. You will fight, shoot, stab, explode, destroy, and conquer in Paradise Mall with over 60 missions and challenges as you upgrade your weapons and exo suit with over 42 different weapons and powers to unlock and upgrade. This is the ultimate supervillain experience!

Key Features:

Fully Destructible Environments:

Every store in Paradise Mall features destructible environments. punch, slice, shoot, or explode the stores and complete robbery missions to unlock new powers and weapons.

Guns, Powers, and Super-suits:

Upgrade your super-suit with new weapons, powers, and skins as you do missions for the people of Paradise Mall, or play in sandbox mode to be a menace from the start with a fully kitted super-suit.

Supervillain Style Movement:

The movement in Exo Mayhem was handcrafted to feel grandiose, fast, and fluid with upgrades to your exo suit allowing you to use superspeed via thruster running, true flight to soar through the skies, and a Just Cause inspired grapnel hook to traverse Paradise Mall quickly and effectively. Combine each of these with different weapons and powers and you become unstoppable!

Gore, Blood, Guts, and Burns:

Exo Mayhem has a realistic NPC reaction system for headshots, dismemberment, gut slices, explosion damage, fire, and adrenaline. When you attack an NPC in Paradise Mall they will react realistically and bleed out, limp, run, or become scorched from fire depending on what weapon and power you used.

Zombies!:

Fight your way through endless zombie hordes in the Exo-Zombies game mode as you journey through a world on the brink of collapse. Each zombie you kill earns money and levels you up with a roguelike progression system. If you prefer to start with everything unlocked, try the Sandbox Mode, where all weapons and powers are available from the start.

content_descriptors.notes: When you kill a human enemy there is blood and gore.
